channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- Wildfly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- Wildfly

item.title: CVE-2016-9589|2024-08-06T02:59:02.944Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- wildfly
item.description: Undertow in Red Hat wildfly before version 11.0.0.Beta1 is vulnerable to a resource exhaustion resulting in a denial of service. Undertow keeps a cache of seen HTTP headers in persistent connections. It was found that this cache can easily exploited to fill memory with garbage, up to "max-headers" (default 200) * "max-header-size" (default 1MB) per active TCP connection.
